examples.example: 我每天都会吃一些水果，来补充身体所需的营养，保持健康。

translate.english: I eat some fruits every day to supplement the nutrients needed by the body and keep healthy.

examples.example: 我去超市买了很多美味的水果，准备和朋友们一起分享。

translate.english: I went to the supermarket to buy a lot of delicious fruits and prepared to share them with friends.

examples.example: 周末我和家人一起去果园采摘新鲜的水果，真是太快乐了。

translate.english: On the weekend, I went to the orchard to pick fresh fruits with my family. It was really so happy.
